summary: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.
cast: Ron Perlman|John Hurt|Selma Blair|Rupert Evans|Karel Roden|Jeffrey Tambor|Doug Jones|Brian Steele|Ladislav Beran|Biddy Hodson|Corey Johnson|Kevin Trainor|Brian Caspe|James Babson|Stephen Fisher|Garth Cooper|Angus MacInnes|Jim Howick|Mark Taylor|Daniel Aarsman|Bettina Ask|Alvaro Navarro|Emilio Navarro|Rory Copus|Tara Hugo|Richard Haas|Andrea Miltner|Jo Eastwood|Charles Grisham|Jan Holicek|Jeremy Zimmermann|Monty L. title: Hellboy
